dataset.title: Floristic Databases of Mecklenburg-Pomerania - Higher Plants

address.deliveryPoint: Museum für Naturkunde, Invalidenstr. 43, 10115 Berlin, Germany

abstract.para: Based on the floristic survey of Eastern Germany (Benkert et al. 1996) a distribution database of higher plants in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern has been managed in the Botanical Institute of Botany and Landscape Ecology at the University of Greifswald. On the occasion of the New critical Flora of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern (Henker & Berg 2005) a comprehensive edit has been done. User input is possible at the website http://www.flora-mv.de.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

address.deliveryPoint: Institute of Botany and Landscape Ecology University of Greifswald, Grimmer Str. 88, 17487 Greifswald, Germany

gbif.citation: Ernst-Moritz-Arndt-Universitaet. Floristic Databases of Mecklenburg-Pomerania - Higher Plants. Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/jvupsl accessed via GBIF.org on 2022-02-08.
